scripts.build:sgp: npm run build prod.sgp.eng.shop && npm run build prod.sgp.eng.layered && npm run build prod.sgp.eng.uf && npm run build prod.sgp.chi.uf && npm run build prod.sgp.chi.shop && npm run build prod.sgp.chi.layered
scripts.build:twn: npm run build prod.twn.eng.layered && npm run build prod.twn.eng.uf && npm run build prod.twn.chi.uf && npm run build prod.twn.chi.shop && npm run build prod.twn.chi.layered
scripts.build:usa: npm run build prod.usa.eng.shop && npm run build prod.usa.eng.layered && npm run build prod.usa.eng.uf && npm run build prod.usa.chi.uf
scripts.build:mys: npm run build prod.mys.eng.shop && npm run build prod.mys.eng.layered && npm run build prod.mys.eng.uf && npm run build prod.mys.chi.uf && npm run build prod.mys.chi.shop && npm run build prod.mys.chi.layered && npm run build prod.mys.msa.shop && npm run build prod.mys.msa.layered && npm run build prod.mys.msa.uf
scripts.build:hkg: npm run build prod.hkg.eng.shop && npm run build prod.hkg.eng.layered && npm run build prod.hkg.eng.uf && npm run build prod.hkg.chi.uf && npm run build prod.hkg.chi.shop && npm run build prod.hkg.chi.layered
